title: com.apple.mcxloginscripts
description: The payload for configuring scripts to run at login and logout.

skipLoginHook.title: skip Login Hook
skipLoginHook.description: If true, doesn't execute the login scripts during login.

loginscripts.title: login scripts
loginscripts.description: !! DO NOT USE HERE !! An array of one or more dictionaries of scripts to run at user login time.

logoutscripts.title: logout scripts
logoutscripts.description: !! DO NOT USE HERE !! An array of one or more dictionaries of scripts to run at user logout time.

skipLogoutHook.title: skip Logout Hook
skipLogoutHook.description: If true, doesn't execute the logout scripts during logout.
